blogPost.title: How can parents better educate their kids about opioids? Answer by Ben Westhoff, Author of Fentanyl, Inc. https://t.co/iw5NUIJtHM https://t.co/yOOjJu4vVI
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 親が子供にオピオイドについて上手に教育するには？回答：Ben Westhoff, Author of Fentanyl, Inc. https://t.co/iw5NUIJtHM https://t.co/yOOjJu4vVI
父母如何更好地对孩子进行阿片类药物的教育？由《芬太尼公司》作者Ben Westhoff回答 https://t.co/iw5NUIJtHM https://t.co/yOOjJu4vVI
父母如何更好地對孩子進行阿片類藥物的教育？由《芬太尼公司》作者Ben Westhoff回答 https://t.co/iw5NUIJtHM https://t.co/yOOjJu4vVI

previous.title: What are good careers where I can make an impact and also a decent living? Answer by @McCambridgeMatt, Co-Founder & CEO @EdenHealthInc, Forbes 30 Under 30. https://t.co/yTfPuk949u https://t.co/1YURVV1wYn

localize.full_text: 影響を与えつつ、きちんとした生活を送ることができる良いキャリアとは？Answer by @McCambridgeMatt, Co-Founder & CEO @EdenHealthInc, Forbes 30 Under 30. https://t.co/yTfPuk949u https://t.co/1YURVV1wYn
有什么好的职业可以让我产生影响，同时也能获得体面的生活？回答者：@McCambridgeMatt，联合创始人& CEO @EdenHealthInc，福布斯30岁以下人士。https://t.co/yTfPuk949u https://t.co/1YURVV1wYn
有什麼好的職業可以讓我產生影響，同時也能獲得體面的生活？回答者：@McCambridgeMatt，聯合創始人& CEO @EdenHealthInc，福布斯30歲以下人士。https://t.co/yTfPuk949u https://t.co/1YURVV1wYn

next.title: What are the easiest ways to decrease debt? Answer by @TheBudgetnista, Personal Finance Educator and CEO of The Budgetnista. https://t.co/GWRx0W7WHB https://t.co/fXzVNf7pJd

localize.full_text: 借金を減らす最も簡単な方法は何ですか？Answer by @TheBudgetnista, Personal Finance Educator and CEO of The Budgetnista. https://t.co/GWRx0W7WHB https://t.co/fXzVNf7pJd
减少债务的最简单方法是什么？回答者：@TheBudgetnista，个人财务教育家和The Budgetnista的CEO。https://t.co/GWRx0W7WHB https://t.co/fXzVNf7pJd
減少債務的最簡單方法是什麼？回答者：@TheBudgetnista，個人財務教育家和The Budgetnista的CEO。https://t.co/GWRx0W7WHB https://t.co/fXzVNf7pJd
